factorfriction-002.content: Select the arrow to test the slide.

factorfriction-009.content: Use the soap to clean the slide and try again.

factorfriction-19.5.content: That was a different way to do it. Great thinking!

factorfriction-19.6.content: You did that in a different way. Good work!

factorfriction-050.content: Now you can make your very own slide for the treehouse.

factorfriction-051.content: Use the arrow buttons to change the height.

factorfriction-052.1.content: Pick your texture, and paint your slide.
Will you go super fast, or have a slow glide?

factorfriction-052.2.content: Will you go fast or will you go slow?
Paint your slide, and then you will know!

factorfriction-052.content: Paint the textures, to change the speed of the slide.

factorfriction-053.content: The sand made the slide slower.

factorfriction-054.1.content: The ice made the slide faster.

factorfriction-054.2.content: The honey made the slide slower.

factorfriction-054.content: The butter made the slide faster.

factorfriction-054.3.content: The rocks made the slide slower.

factorfriction-054.4.content: The rollers made the slide faster.

factorfriction-054.5.content: The glue made the slide slower.

factorfriction-054.6.content: The oil made the slide faster.

factorfriction-055.content: When you're happy with your slide, select the home button
to go to the backyard and see it in action.

factorfriction-07.content: You can use a different texture to change the speed of the slide.

fof-end-p1-nick.content: Hooray! The Frictionarium slide park is finished!

fof-end-p1-sally.content: Hooray! The Frictionarium slide park is finished!

fof-failure-faster-generic.content: Oh no! That was too slow.
Our goal was to be faster than the Things.

fof-failure-fq-generic-faster.content: What can you change, to make us go faster?

fof-failure-fq-generic-slower.content: What can you change to make us go slower?

fof-failure-slower-generic.content: Oh no! We were supposed to go slower than the Things.

fof-failure-tie-generic.content: Whoops! We were supposed to tie with them.
Let's change the slide to cross at the same time as them.

fof-goal-generic-faster.content: Let's go faster than the Things.

fof-goal-generic-slower.content: Let's go slower than the Things.

fof-goal-generic-tie.content: Let's go across the finish line at the same time as the Things.

fof-level-intro-alt1.content: We wanna finish this slide for the Frictionarium too!

fof-level-intro-alt2.content: Here's another slide that needs to be finished for the Frictionarium.

fof-mmb-inspect-butter.content: Whoa! This butter looks slick and greasy.

fof-mmb-inspect-honey.content: This honey looks smooth, but it might be sticky.

fof-mmb-inspect-sand.content: Hmm, this sand looks rough and gritty.

fof-mmb-prompt-p1.content: The Micro-ma-boodle helps us to examine things up close,

fof-mmb-prompt-p2-alt1.content: Drag the Micro-ma-boodle over the slide
to see what it looks like up close.

fof-mmb-prompt-p2-alt2.content: Use the Micro-ma-boodle to get a closer look at your slide.

fof-mmb-prompt-mystery.content: Use the Micro-ma-boodle to get a closer look.

fof-next-prompt.content: Press the arrow button to try a different slide.
Or, press the curly arrow to try the same slide again.

fof-replay-prompt.content: Press the arrow button to try another slide.

fof-success-faster-generic-nick.content: We got to the finish line before the Things!

fof-success-faster-generic-sally.content: Alright! We were faster than the Things.

fof-success-generic-sally-alt1.content: We're messy, but we're having fun!

fof-success-slower-generic-nick.content: You did it! We went slower than the Things. Good work!

fof-success-slower-generic-sally.content: Alright! We were slower than the Things. Just like our goal!

fof-success-tie-generic-nick.content: We tied with the Things, just like our goal.

fof-success-tie-generic-sally.content: We crossed the finish line at the same time.

fof-tutorial-height-pt2.content: Try making the slide taller or shorter,
by pressing the up or down arrows here!

fof-tutorial-height-pt3.content: Use the arrows to make the slide steeper or flatter!

fof-tutorial-height-pt4.content: Nice job! That slide was very fast.

fof-tutorial-height-pt5.content: Nice job! That slide was very slow.

fof-tutorial-height-pt6.content: Try a different height, and see what happens.

fof-tutorial-height-pt7.content: Alright, it's time we get to the slide races.

fof-tutorial-height-slidesequal.content: Both slides are the same height.

fof-tutorial-height-slidetaller.content: One slide is taller than the other.

fof-tutorial-intro.content: Welcome to the Frictionarium! We're building a slide park.
But we need your help, let's begin by testing this slide.

fof-tutorial-lose-p1.content: Thing 2 wants to race, he never gets to win!
So let's let him go faster and win. Your goal is to come in second place.

fof-tutorial-lose-p2.content: You changed the height of the slide.
Let's test it and see if Nick goes slower than Thing 1.

fof-tutorial-lose-p3.content: Terrific job! You let Thing 2 win!

fof-tutorial-lose-p4.content: Change the height of the slide and try again!

fof-tutorial-texture-p1.content: Look! I see some butter and I see some sand.
I wonder what would happen if we painted the slides.
Won't you try it? That would be grand!

fof-tutorial-texture-p2.content: Which texture do you want to try?

fof-tutorial-texture-p3-butter.content: You tried butter, how clever of you!
Why it made Sally faster than Thing 1 and Thing 2!

fof-tutorial-texture-p3-sand.content: You tried sand! What did it do?
Why, it made Sally slower than Thing 1 and Thing 2.

fof-tutorial-texture-p4-wash.content: If you want to try a different kind of texture,
Be sure to wash off your slide first.

fof-tutorial-tie-p1.content: Let's try something new! Can you go the same speed as Thing 1?
Your goal is to cross at the exact same time to tie!

fof-tutorial-win-p1.content: Oh look! Thing 1 wants to race.
Your goal for this race is to go faster and finish first.
Let’s see how fast Nick can go with the slide this high.

fof-tutorial-win-p3.content: Make the slide taller, to go faster than Thing 1.

fof-tutorial-win-p4.content: The slide is higher now, let's test it now, and see how we do.

fof-tutorial-win-p5.content: Great job! Nick was faster because his slide was higher.

payoff-125.content: This is going to be an awesome slide park when we're done!

payoff-126.content: Oooh! We're getting closer to completing the Frictionarium!

fof-mmb-inspect-oil.content: That oil looks slick and fast.

fof-mmb-inspect-rocks.content: The rocks look really rough and bumpy.

fof-mmb-inspect-rollers.content: Rollers spin fast when you go over them.

fof-mmb-inspect-glue.content: Glue is sticky, and holds stuff together.
